This special spark can be placed on top of any &4Inventory&0, like a &1Chest&0 or a &1Dispenser&0 as opposed to &4Mana Containers&0.
When the spark is placed or polled, it will poll any &1Corporea Sparks&0 within a &815×15×15&0 area centered on the spark, adding them together to form a network if a $(l:1_items/master_spark)&1Master Corporea Spark&0$(/l) is present.

To place a Spark, right-click on a block. If right-click already has an action, shift right-click instead.When placed on an &4Inventory&0, it will &4provide access&0 to its contents to the Corporea network.
When placed on a &4Corporea block&0, it will allow it to &4pull&0 from the network's contents.
